name: Brussels Sprout Pasta
instructions: Clean and thinly slice brussels sprouts
Mix brussels sprouts with oil, salt, pepper. Place on lined baking sheet and bake for 8 to 10 minutes
Saute shallot/onion and garlic for 3 minutes, until soft
Add broth, cream, lemon zest/juice and bring to boil
Reduce to simmer and fold in noodles and brussels sprouts
Add salt and pepper to taste
For extra spice, add red pepper flakes
